description: Out of borough consultation for Buckinghamshire County Council: Outline planning permission for demolition and redevelopment to comprise a data centre (Sui Generis (Data Centre)) of up to 55,000sqm (GEA) (excluding gantries) including ancillary offices, internal plant & equipment and substation (all matters reserved). In addition to the above the development may also include: car parking; provision of external plant and equipment and fuel storage; creation of servicing areas and provision of associated services, including waste, refuse, cycle storage and lighting; and for the laying out of the buildings; routes and open spaces within the development; all associated and ancillary works and operations including but not limited to: demolition; earthworks; provision of attenuation infrastructure, engineering operations.
